data.title: Marttinen, Risto
data.meta_description: Marttinen, Risto. Welcome to the College of Education and Human Development (CEHD), George Mason University located in Fairfax Virginia and includes the Graduate School of Education and School of Recreation, Health & Tourism.
data.text:
